      • copyFromAnotherLimeFlowTable

      • handleFlowMods

        public boolean handleFlowMods(FVFlowMod fm)
        Process FlowMods according to command field, writing out FlowMods south if needed.
        Parameters:
        fm - The FlowMod to apply to this table
        cookie - the cookie value - FlowTable will return the cookie value that it decided to use in this value. This may be a cookie already in the table, or the one supplied to this method.
        Returns:
        if the FlowMod needs to be sent south during de-virtualization.

      • handleFlowRemoved

        public boolean handleFlowRemoved(org.openflow.protocol.OFFlowRemoved flowRemoved)

      • getFlowMod

        public FVFlowMod getFlowMod(java.lang.Long cookie)
        get a FVFlowMod out of the map without removing it.
        Parameters:
        cookie - the physical cookie
        Returns:
        a clone of the stored FlowMod, if found.
        Throws:
        MappingException
